title: What happens to Orange Essence after the Preseason update?
body:
It hasn't been discussed.

Should I disenchant my skin shards too??

replies.body:
~~Orange essence won't be impacted.  The major change is that IP is going to be converted to blue essence, and orange will remain the same.  More info in our preseason faq as well.  I hope that helps offer some relief!~~

My response here was inaccurate- my bad.  See Cactopus' follow-up [here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fYrwaiL4-what-happens-to-orange-essence-after-the-preseason-update?comment=00000001) for the correct info.  Sorry guys.

For future reference, this is actually incorrect. We're nerfing orange essence disenchant rates and we've been very careful to communicate about it ever since we originally announced these changes: https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/en-us/2017/09/upcoming-changes-to-leveling-ip-rewards/

> Since you’ll be getting so many more shards thanks to the new leveling system (and with other recent changes to honor and events), we’ll tune down the relative value of the essence you get from disenchanting shards **of all types—champ shards, skin shards, and ward skin shards**.... To offset the disenchant rate changes, we’re going to change the way loot chests work so you’ll have a chance to get two drops in each chest. Get ready for chests inside of your chests. We’ll also add “bad luck protection,” so you won’t ever go on long streaks without getting a skin shard or a gemstone from chests.

We've also posted about this in the preseason FAQ: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908-Preseason-Update-FAQ

Find that under this question: "Are you making any changes to the way disenchanting shards works?"

Sorry for the confusion, guys.
how is this fair to post after the pre-season started? I held my skin shards thinking nothing would change, and now this happens? That's not entirely fair, right?

It's not fair, A Riot employee told us one thing, and the company did another. Instead of acting in good faith they basically are just saying, "well fuck you for listening to that guy...."

Riot has been awful at communication for a long long time, this is another proof of that. Especially since they won't fix it. They already got a good amount of my money and im assuming yours...what do they care about us now.

"Sorry for the confusion, guys."

Clarification after we've all been boned. Sooooo Sorry.....

There was literally a warning IN CLIENT telling you to disenchant shards you didn't want to upgrade because of the changes. 

What more do you want? Them to come to your house?

The warning told people to disenchant all shards, but didn't specifically mention skin shards or orange essence. If you come from the position of knowing that they had no plans to work on yellow essence 1 week before the patch kicks in, that statement translates to "disenchant all your champion shards".  

Afterall the  main thing of the patch was the blue essence change and the champion shards. Considering you couldn't reroll champions anymore and dust would be multiplied by 6.5 it made perfect sense that they were telling you to disenchant your champion shards.
Couldn't agree more with you. The new system is just sick.
Why didn't you say this was incorrect before the preseason started? This riot post screwed a lot of people.
Please dude can you revert the yellow essence to it's prior value until next patch? We took the info from porocles as true i lost so much yellow essence man im gonna lose my mind
Oh.. Well I kept my skin shard in tact, for no reason? I'm very disappointed.

Can you please answer us? We are dieing over here. This is not a trivial issue this post got picked up by some major sites and im pretty sure that there are people by the thousands that didn't know you were going to change yellow essence because they thought this was legitimate news. Keep in mind, news that came a week before the change. 

I myself only found out because somebody else told me and he didn't knew either because he took the info from this post aswell ( the post got reported on ff@20 which is one of the biggest news sites for league)

We are not asking for much but since it was a miscommunication problem from your side the only thing that i'd like to happen is for us to get the chance to disenchant our shards like those who, paradoxically, didn't inform themselves when we did, had.

At least tell me this is getting discussed at riot, please man tell me that somebody knows this has happened.

That's not fair, Ryan.  (Just like what you did to me 5 years ago)

I very clearly remember seeing this and other posts like it that there would be no changes to skin shards or orange essence and maintained that until I was unpleasantly surprised come preseason and I found my shards were worth less.  Official source telling me one thing, I pass on that information and believe that information and it's wrong.  Can't just say this after the fact when I (and I assume others too) have been screwed by it.  I/We took this information as accurate and made decisions based on it and should have the same opportunity to de shards that everyone else had with different official information.

This thread was the top googled result leading up to the moment when preseason hit. This is shady as fuck to change retroactively. I wish I could enjoy the Preseason, but it's good to see Riot is determined to shaft its long-time players.

I also got -screwed- by this post as someone who hordes shards and only disenchants them when I want to craft something. This is not acceptable. We all took these posts (this was NOT the only communication stating this) In good faith and got screwed by it, a simple sorry isn't really enough.
